ygData.subject: Re: Harlow..come to join ya guyz!
ygData.msgSnippet: Welcome to the world of EQ.  I think the server with most local players is Innoruuk.  If you play human, you will get to see pple like Yiyang, Wilson, Gary
ygData.messageBody:
Welcome to the world of EQ. I think the server with most local players is
Innoruuk. If you play human, you will get to see pple like Yiyang, Wilson,
Gary etc, if you play half-elf, high-elf, u will see me and Leshrec. We
all started off at different zones, so will take us sometime when we can
fight our way thru to the other zones to meet ;) Since you play an elf,
let meet Leshrec and me tonight. Login and try these commands:

/friend xxx (to make xxx a friend)
/who friend all (show all ya friends who is online in EQ)
/tell xxx <sentense> (to talk to xxx directly even if both of you dun see
one another, like ICQ)

Just to clarfy, I dun think you can use a 2 character name - "Chen" and
"YuYun". I try to use back my old name from UO "Dark Flame" but it doesn't
allow me. In the end I use part of my UO scout name "Zilred Joertzs" =
Zilred (enchanter). Now I playing Zilred's cousin - Ziltus. Maybe you can
try using name like "YuYun"" or "BallBall" (she got a bally face) heheh...

On Tuesday, May 18, 1999 2:59 PM, Entreri [SMTP:drizzt@...]
wrote:
> YEA!mom let me play liao!hehehe..As I am typing this,gonna enter the game

laugh]
